mapper.select:
select a.com_name, a.industry , b.com_img_url from comInfo a, comImgInfo b where a.COM_CODE = b.COM_CODE
and com_name like '%'||#{value}||'%' and com_logo='Y'

select a.com_name, a.nation, a.region, b.com_img_url, c.pos_name from comInfo a inner join comImgInfo b on a.COM_CODE = b.COM_CODE inner join position c on a.COM_CODE = c.COM_CODE
where c.pos_name like '%'||#{value}||'%' and com_logo='N'
select distinct com_name from comInfo where com_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' union all select distinct pos_name from position where pos_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select com_code, com_Name, industry, (select com_Img_Url from comimgInfo c1 where c1.com_Code=c2.com_code and c1.com_logo like '%N%' and rownum=1)as com_img_url from comInfo c2 where (select com_Img_Url from comimgInfo c1 where c1.com_Code=c2.com_code and rownum=1) is not null order by com_regdate desc)
where rownum<=4

select * from (select pro_image, pro_name from program where pro_image is not null order by regdate desc)
where rownum <=6
